history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: Lim_seq_correct. qsimpl time: 1 use: Lim_seq_correct. qsimpl time: 1 use: Lim_seq_correct.

exceptions.exn: In environment u : nat -> R l : R Hl : is_lim_seq u l P : R -> Prop Unable to unify "match Lim_seq ?M2368 with | Finite a => locally a P | p_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, M < x -> P x | m_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, x < M -> P x end" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : R_UniformSpace, ball (Lim_seq u) eps y -> P y".

In environment H : forall u : nat -> R, ex_lim_seq u -> is_lim_seq u (Lim_seq u) u : nat -> R l : R Hl : is_lim_seq u l P : R -> Prop H0 : Rbar_locally (Lim_seq u) P The term "l" has type "R" while it is expected to have type "nat".
In environment H0 : forall u : nat -> R, ex_lim_seq u -> is_lim_seq u (Lim_seq u) u : nat -> R l : R Hl : is_lim_seq u l Unable to unify "is_lim_seq u l" with "is_lim_seq u (Lim_seq u)".

original: intro H. destruct H as [l Hl]. apply Lim_seq_correct. exists l. apply Hl.
